title: Terms of services and Privacy Policy
meta_description: Read the Privacy Policy and ToS for TreeBot
introduction: In the following "We" / "Our" / "Us" refers to the developer (chumbed10s) of TreeBot (referenced as "TreeBot", "Bot" or "Service" in this document) and "You" refers to the user of TreeBot. This article may be updated periodically and without prior notice to you to reflect changes in our information practices. We will post a notice on the Official Treebot Support Server about any substantive changes to the way we collect and use the information as well as changes to our Terms of Service. We will indicate at the top of this article when it was last updated. Please read the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service (the "Terms") before using Treebot.
warning_message: By using our Service, you agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of the Terms or Privacy Policy, you are not allowed to use our service.
what_is_treebot_description: TreeBot is a Discord Application that allows you to have a tree in your server that you, and the members can interact with
bot_details_description: To verify the bot is the original one, you can check the following details
privacy_policy_description: At TreeBot, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our Discord Application.
when_collect_data_description: We will never store any data unless the user performs an action in the bot. This includes the following:
collect_data_background: Buying a tree background in the /shop
collect_data_water: Watering a tree (by using /water command or clicking the ðŸ’¦ button on a server tree)
collect_data_fertilize: Fertilizing a tree (by using /fertilize command or clicking the ðŸŒ± button on a server tree)
collect_data_mega_fertilize: Mega Fertilizing a tree (by using /mega_fertilize command or clicking the ðŸª´ button on a server tree)
linked_to_server_tree: By doing any of these actions, except the first one, you will also be linked to the server tree to show you per server statistics
what_data_collect_description: When you use our bot, we collect the following data:
data_note1: * This data is only collected if you create a server tree
data_note2: ** These data are only collected if you activate those features
how_use_data_description: We use the data collected to:
use_data_profile_description: We need your User ID to link you to your in-game profile. Your in-game profile will store:
profile_fertilizer: The amount of fertilizer that you own.
profile_mega_fertilizer: The number of mega fertilizers that you own.
use_data_server_tree_description: If you own a server tree (By creating one with /start), we will store your server ID among the following in-game data:
server_tree_server_id_desc: The server ID of the server where you created your server tree
server_tree_channel_id_desc: the channel where treebot will post the server tree message
server_tree_message_id_desc: the ID of the server tree message, the one that TreeBot will edit and update
server_tree_webhook_desc: The webhook URL for the notifications of the server tree. Tree bot will post there only when a user performs an action on the server tree
server_tree_metres_desc: How many metres the server tree has
server_tree_experience_desc: The experience of the server tree
server_tree_background_desc: The background of the server tree
server_tree_language_desc: The language the tree is in (if set)
server_tree_name_desc: How you renamed the server tree (if set)
server_tree_backgrounds_desc: The backgrounds that you and your users bought for the tree
server_tree_role_permissions_desc: The Role ID that you allow/deny to interact with the server tree (if set)
use_data_statistics_description: We link your user ID to the server ID where you interacted with the server tree to show you your statistics for that server as well as some other important data.
statistics_server_id_desc: The server the stat is for
statistics_water_desc: How many times you watered the server tree
statistics_fertilizer_desc: How many times you fertilized the server tree
statistics_mega_fertilizer_desc: How many times you mega fertilized the server tree
statistics_fruits_desc: The number of fruits you got from the tree
statistics_coins_desc: The number of coins you got from the tree
use_data_logging_description: We log all your actions in the server tree, such as when you watered it, fertilized it, etc. To keep the game levelled and in case of any issue with the tree, we need to know what happened. Even for giving out rewards, in case it affects any user profile. We also use this data to track users to see if they are abusing any exploits.
who_can_access_title: Who can access to your information?
who_can_access_description: There is only one sensitive piece of information, which is your webhook Webhook URL and the only one that can access this information is the bot owner. chumbed10s.
who_can_access_additional: All other information is not sensitive and can be accessed by anyone on the server. If you are still concerned about this, please contact us on the Support server.
how_long_data_kept_title: How long is my data stored?
how_long_data_kept_description: If you decide to play the game by interacting on a server or by creating a tree, your data will be kept forever indefinitely. We will not delete any data automatically. However, you can request data deletion by contacting us at the end of this page.
data_deletion_policy: Any of the data can be requested to be removed, use the contact details provided. If you request the deletion of your data, all data will be removed from the database except your discord user ID. This is kept for the purpose to prevent users using our Service without agreeing with our Terms or Privacy Policy. Data deletion may take up to 14 days.
terms_of_service_intro: By using our Service, you agree to the following Terms of Service:
terms_age: You are not an individual under the age of 13 years (or the equivalent for your jurisdiction)
terms_discord_tos: You will not violate these terms, the Discord Terms of Service nor the Discord Guidelines
terms_illegal_use: You will not use our Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
terms_bugs: You will not abuse or exploit unwanted behaviour, also known as "bugs", related to our Service and report these on the Support server
terms_interruption: You will not attempt to purposely interrupt the operation of the bot
revoke_access_notice: You agree that we may at any time, revoke you to access our Service or the support server temporarily or permanently for any reason, with or without prior notice.
contact_us_description: If you have any questions or concerns about our Service, please contact us at:
